A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I came into this movie with an open mind & with no high expectation. From what The Force Awakens gave me\, I was excited to see some missing links to be connected\, & background stories explain coming into The Last Jedi. Boy was I so let down by this movie. There are so many missing pieces to where I still have questions & they didn't even give me a small peak to carry over to episode 9. It feels like Episode 9 could be a hot mess & JJ Abbrams will have a lot of cleaning up to do from episode 8. It will be a miracle if JJ can save episode 9.
